mapper.select:
SELECT terminal.id, mac.* FROM ( SELECT *, IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active'
), 0 ) AS v4ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip1 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip2 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip3 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip1 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip2 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip3 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT client_hostname FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip LIMIT 1 ), NULL ) AS client_hostname FROM metoo_mac mac WHERE tag = 'DT') mac
join
metoo_terminal terminal on terminal.mac = mac.mac and terminal.port = mac.port

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip1 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip2 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip3 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip1 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip2 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip3 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT client_hostname FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip LIMIT 1 ), NULL ) AS client_hostname FROM metoo_mac mac WHERE tag = 'DT' ) mac LEFT JOIN metoo_terminal terminal ON terminal.mac = mac.mac WHERE terminal.mac IS NULL

SELECT terminal.id, mac.* FROM ( SELECT *, IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip1 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip2 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip3 AND dhcp.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v4ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ipDynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip1 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip1 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip1Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip2 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip2 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip2Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v6ip3 IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT
IF (iaaddr IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) FROM metoo_dhcp6 dhcp6 WHERE dhcp6.iaaddr = mac.v6ip3 AND dhcp6.binding_state = 'active' ), 0 ) AS v6ip3Dynamic,
IF ( mac.v4ip IS NOT NULL, ( SELECT client_hostname FROM metoo_dhcp dhcp WHERE dhcp.lease = mac.v4ip LIMIT 1 ), NULL ) AS client_hostname FROM metoo_mac mac WHERE tag = 'DT' ) mac
right join
metoo_terminal terminal on terminal.mac = mac.mac where mac.mac is null
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO metoo_terminal_asset
addTime,
`name`,
mac,
port,
deviceIp,
deviceName,
deviceUuid,
tag,
type,
hostname,
remoteDevice,
remotePort,
v4ip,
v4ip1,
v4ip2,
v4ip3,
v6ip,
v6ip1,
v6ip2,
v6ip3,
macVendor,
online,
client_hostname,
name,
interfaceName,
index,
uuid,
interfaceIndex,
interfaceStatus,
remoteInterface,
remoteUuid,
vendor,
vlan,
duty,
location,
purchase_time,
warranty_time,
price,
serial_number,
asset_number,
description,
change_reasons,
`from`,
projectId,
vendorId,
model,
deviceTypeId,
#{addTime},
#{name},
#{mac},
#{port},
#{deviceIp},
#{deviceName},
#{deviceUuid},
#{tag},
#{type},
#{hostname},
#{remoteDevice},
#{remotePort},
#{v4ip},
#{v4ip1},
#{v4ip2},
#{v4ip3},
#{v6ip},
#{v6ip1},
#{v6ip2},
#{v6ip3},
#{macVendor},
#{online},
#{client_hostname},
#{name},
#{interfaceName},
#{index},
#{uuid},
#{interfaceIndex},
#{interfaceStatus},
#{remoteInterface},
#{remoteUuid},
#{vendor},
#{vlan},
#{duty},
#{location},
#{purchase_time},
#{warranty_time},
#{price},
#{serial_number},
#{asset_number},
#{description},
#{changeReasons},
#{from},
#{projectId},
#{vendorId},
#{model},
#{deviceTypeId},
mapper.update:
UPDATE metoo_terminal_asset
addTime = #{addTime},
name = #{name},
mac = #{mac},
port = #{port},
deviceIp = #{deviceIp},
deviceName = #{deviceName},
deviceUuid = #{deviceUuid},
tag = #{tag},
type = #{type},
hostname = #{hostname},
remoteDevice = #{remoteDevice},
remotePort = #{remotePort},
v4ip = #{v4ip},
v4ip1 = #{v4ip1},
v4ip2 = #{v4ip2},
v4ip3 = #{v4ip3},
v6ip = #{v6ip},
v6ip1 = #{v6ip1},
v6ip2 = #{v6ip2},
v6ip3 = #{v6ip3},
macVendor = #{macVendor},
online = #{online},
client_hostname = #{client_hostname},
name = #{name},
interfaceName = #{interfaceName},
index = #{index},
uuid = #{uuid},
interfaceIndex = #{interfaceIndex},
interfaceStatus = #{interfaceStatus},
remoteInterface = #{remoteInterface},
remoteUuid = #{remoteUuid},
vendor = #{vendor},
vlan = #{vlan},
duty = #{duty},
location = #{location},
purchase_time = #{purchase_time},
warranty_time = #{warranty_time},
price = #{price},
serial_number = #{serial_number},
asset_number = #{asset_number},
description = #{description},
changeReasons = #{changeReasons},
from = #{from},
projectId = #{projectId},
vendorId = #{vendorId},
model = #{model},
deviceTypeId = #{deviceTypeId},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `metoo_terminal_asset` ( addTime, mac, port, type, deviceIp, deviceName, deviceUuid, tag, hostname, remoteDevice, remotePort, remoteUuid, v4ip, v4ip1, v4ip2, v4ip3, v4ipDynamic, v4ip1Dynamic, v4ip2Dynamic, v4ip3Dynamic, v6ip, v6ip1, v6ip2, v6ip3, v6ipDynamic, v6ip1Dynamic, v6ip2Dynamic, v6ip3Dynamic, online, client_hostname, uuid, deviceTypeId ) VALUES
( #{item.addTime}, #{item.mac}, #{item.port}, #{item.type}, #{item.deviceIp}, #{item.deviceName}, #{item.deviceUuid}, #{item.tag}, #{item.hostname}, #{item.remoteDevice}, #{item.remotePort}, #{item.remoteUuid}, #{item.v4ip}, #{item.v4ip1}, #{item.v4ip2}, #{item.v4ip3}, #{item.v4ipDynamic}, #{item.v4ip1Dynamic}, #{item.v4ip2Dynamic}, #{item.v4ip3Dynamic}, #{item.v6ip}, #{item.v6ip1}, #{item.v6ip2}, #{item.v6ip3}, #{item.v6ipDynamic}, #{item.v6ip1Dynamic}, #{item.v6ip2Dynamic}, #{item.v6ip3Dynamic}, #{item.online}, #{item.client_hostname}, #{item.uuid}, #{item.deviceTypeId} )

update.foreach:
UPDATE metoo_terminal_asset
addTime = #{item.addTime},
online = #{item.online},
port = #{item.port},
deviceIp = #{item.deviceIp},
deviceName = #{item.deviceName},
deviceUuid = #{item.deviceUuid},
tag = #{item.tag},
remoteDevice = #{item.remoteDevice},
remotePort = #{item.remotePort},
remoteUuid = #{item.remoteUuid},
v4ip = #{item.v4ip},
v4ip1 = #{item.v4ip1},
v4ip2 = #{item.v4ip2},
v4ip3 = #{item.v4ip3},
v6ip = #{item.v6ip},
v6ip1 = #{item.v6ip1},
v6ip2 = #{item.v6ip2},
v6ip3 = #{item.v6ip3},
v4ipDynamic = #{item.v4ipDynamic},
v4ip1Dynamic = #{item.v4ip1Dynamic},
v4ip2Dynamic = #{item.v4ip2Dynamic},
v4ip3Dynamic = #{item.v4ip3Dynamic},
v6ipDynamic = #{item.v6ipDynamic},
v6ip1Dynamic = #{item.v6ip1Dynamic},
v6ip2Dynamic = #{item.v6ip2Dynamic},
v6ip3Dynamic = #{item.v6ip3Dynamic},
client_hostname = #{item.client_hostname},
WHERE id = #{item.id}

mapper.update: INSERT INTO metoo_terminal_asset_history SELECT * FROM metoo_terminal_asset
